info.name: Glific APIs
info.description:
Glific is a WhatsApp based open source 2-way communication platform for NGOs to have conversations with their community. It is being developed under Project Tech4Dev initiative of [OpenBrackets Foundation](https://openbrackets.in)

Glific uses **GraphQL** to structure the APIs. The only exception is the **Authentication APIs** which use REST. An API endpoint has been created for all the features.

In all the sample code, **please replace:**

_api.staging.tides.coloredcow.com_

WITH

**api.YOURSITENAME.tides.coloredcow.com**

request.description:
This returns all the messages for the organization filtered by the input [MessageFilter](https://glific.github.io/slate/#messagefilter)

**Messages filters** 👇 **:**

| **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| body | [String](https://glific.github.io/slate/#string) | Match the body |
| Sender | [String](https://glific.github.io/slate/#string) | Match the sender name |
| Receiver | [String](https://glific.github.io/slate/#string) | Match the receiver name |
| Either | [String](https://glific.github.io/slate/#string) | Match the phone with either the sender or receiver |
| BspStatus | [String](https://glific.github.io/slate/#string) | Match the status |
| DateRange | DateRangeObject | {from: "2022-11-01", to: "2022-11-01", column: "inserted_at"} |
| flowId | ID | Match the flow for a message |

response.name: Get All Messages with body filter
